name: Eva Franco Monaco
description: The picture really doesn't do this AMAZEBALLS dress justice. The gold woven multi-shiny oh la la body of this dress is luxurious and exotic. Paired with the bright turquoise mesh shoulders is something unexpected and indulgent. Whether for a night on the town, or a special occasion, this dress ought to insure a happy ending...whatever your idea of a happy ending is. Fit: Runs a bit generously, almost a size up. You'll want this baby fitted to your curves (but not skin tight! there's no stretch in the body of the dress). Size 2 fits up to 34 inch bust, up to 27 inch waist, up to 36.5 inch hips. Size 4 fits up to 35 inch bust, up to 28 inch waist, up to 37.5 inch hips..etc... Chuck wears a size 4 with the waist taken in. Designed in LA, made in USA 53% Cotton 47% Polyester / Shoulder 80% Nylon 20% Spandex / Lining 100% Polyester Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Yoana Baraschi Turbulent Indigo
description: The shade of blue on this classy dress is so deep it can only be described in the words of our wise girl, Joni. Turbulent indigo background gets a splash of color with a watercolor-like feather. The best part is the sheer panel across the neckline to offset the long sleeves. This is one dress you'll grab for over and over...and over again. Measures 33 inches from neckline to hem. Fit: Easy and runs true to size. Size 2 fits a bust up to 34 inches. Size 4 fits a bust up to 35 inches. Size 6 fits a bust up to 36 inches, etc. If you're well endowed up top, size up. Chuck wears a size 4 for a little extra room in the shoulders and bust. Designed and made in New York City 100% Silk Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Allison Parris A-List dress
description: The party season is upon us. So let. us. party. And let's start with this classic sweetheart strapless A-line dress in a fabulously exotic marigold color or royally rich purple. Boning in the bodice lend support for the girls so you can dance the night away worry free. And we guarantee volume of the crinoline skirt will last longer than your hairdo. Measures 19 inches from waist to hem. Fit: True to size but on the roomy side in the cups. Smaller gals will want to wear a padded strapless bra or have other assistance in that area. This dress has boning at the bust and ample cup room for comfort and support where you need it. And with a strapless dress, you usually need it. If you're between sizes or extra gifted up top, size up and get the waist taken in. A size 2 fits up to a 34 inch bust and up to 26 inch waist. A size 4 fits a 35 inch bust and up to 27.5 inch waist. A size 6 fits a 36 inch bust and up to 28.5 inch waist. Chuck wears a size 4. Designed and made in USA. 100% Silk / Lining 100% polyester from recycled PET Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Eva Franco Peek a Bow dress
description: Oh la la! Pale pink ballerina dotted jacquard with a over-sized bow front and center is sure to grab everyone's attention. We love the slightly dropped waist with the pleated puckered waistline. It's playful but sleek. This one certainly fits under the category of "dress to impress." Fit: Fits true to size. Size 2 fits up to a 33 inch bust, up to a 25.5 inch waist and up to 36.5 inch hips. Size 4 fits up to a 34.5 inch bust, up to a 26.5 inch waist and 37.5 inch hips. Size 6 fits up to a 35.5 inch bust, up to a 27.5 inch waist and up to 38.5 inch hips. Chuck wears a size 6 for the extra room around the bust but needs the waist taken in. Measures 17 inches from dropped waist (at the top of your hip bone) to hem. Designed and made in USA Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Darling O.K. Coral
description: No gunfights here, women are much too sophisticated for that. We just judge your clothes. Get out of the line of fire in this classic shape and of the moment color: coral. Not-quite sleeves give a little upper arm coverage and shoulder definition. Darting and pleats enhance an hourglass figure and the contrasting crochet waist really gets the message home. Oh, don't forget the shoes, because we'll judge your shoes, too. Fit: X-Small fits a size 0 to size 2 (up to 33.5 inch bust, up to 25.5 inch waist, up to 35.5 inch hips). Small fits a size 4 (up to 34.5 inch bust, up to 27 inch waist, up to 37 inch hips). Medium fits a size 6 (up to 35.5 inch bust, up to 28 inch waist, up to 38 inch hips), etc.. Chuck wears a Small. Designed in 95% Polyester 5% Elastane / Lining 100% Polyester / Lace 100% Polyester Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Yoana Baraschi Estate dress
description: Black lace goes with nude lining like peanut butter goes with jelly. Like french fries go with ketchup. Like hot chocolate goes with a good book. This easy tunic dress pairs long sleeves with a shorter hem line, perfect to wear with some tights or tall boots in chilly weather. Or bare those legs with some strappy sandals in warmer temps. Measures 29 inches from neckline to hem. Fit: Easy peasy. Runs true to size. Size 2 fits up to a 34 inch bust. Size 4 fits up to a 35 inch bust. Size 6 fits up to a 36 inch bust, etc. Chuck wears a size 4 for a more relaxed fit around the shoulders and bust. Designed and made in New York City Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Yoana Baraschi Sands of Time
description: Yes yes, so are the days of our lives. How can we forget?? Just like you'll be quite unforgettable in this drop.dead.lovin'.it. lace dress in a romantic vintage inspired rosy/sandy/beigey hue. It's like great grannie's wedding dress you found in the attic, but sans the dust and moth balls. There's just something about this dress. There's so much something we don't even know what to say about it. It says it for itself. So there. Fit: Runs true to size. And it looks good! Size 2 fits up to a 33 inch bust, up to 25 inch waist. Size 4 fits up to a 34 inch bust, up to 26 inch waist. Size 6 fits up to a 35 inch bust, up to a 27 inch waist...etc... Chuck wears a size 4. Designed in New York, made in India 100% Silk / Lace 100% Cotton / Lining 100% Viscose Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Allison Parris Luck Be a Lady dress
description: Peplum is here to stay, and with peplum done like this, it's no wonder. Done in this soft organic raw silk (looks and feels like linen!), the waterfall peplum adds only a little volume to accentuate the hourglass figure, but adds a lot of feminine grace (psssst! This is the designer looking amazing in her own design in the second photo!). Measures 19 inches from waist to hem. Fit: True to size. Allison Parris is the master of strapless dresses. Expert boning in the bodice gives plenty of support so you're not constantly checking for wardrobe malfunction. Appreciated. Size 2 fits a bust up to 34 inches, waist up to 25.5 inches, and hips up to 35 inches. Size 4 fits a bust up to 35 inches, waist up to 26.5 inches and hips up to 36 inches, etc. Chuck wears a size 4.

name: Allison Parris Rizzo dress
description: Misunderstood bad girl with a heart of gold. OK, so this dress has nothing to do with any of that, but we love Rizzo. And we love the slightly retro details on this fun tulle number. Leather leaves scattered across the left shoulder and the designer's initial "A" recalls the days of letterman jackets and poofy skirts. Fit: A size 2 fits up to a 34 inch bust and up to 26 inch waist. A size 4 fits a 35 inch bust and up to 28 inch waist. A size 6 fits a 36 inch bust and up to 29 inch waist. Chuck wears a size 4 for a more relaxed fit around the shoulders and bust. Designed and made in USA. 100% polyester from recycled PET Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Eva Franco Pinwheeling
description: The colors on this dress are so very summer in Montauk...beachy, cool, crisp and laid back. But the fit and shape says bold, daring and hear me roar. We are suckers for contrast. But it all just comes down to the fact that we love the almost chevron (which is so in that it was never out) pattern. A little shoulder coverage is welcome and only adds to the strong lines of the dress, helping to create a small waist. Fit: Runs generously. Fabric is woven without stretch, but you'll want this fitted as close as possible. Size 2 fits up to a 34.5 inch bust, up to a 26.5 in waist and up to 36.5 inch hips. Size 4 fits up to a 35.5 inch bust, up to a 27.5 inch waist and up to 37.5 inch hips. Size 6 fits up to a 36.5 inch bust, up to 28.5 inch waist and up to 38.5 inch hips...etc... Chuck can wear a size 2 or 4 but prefers the look of the 2 (but it's quite snug...if you prefer a more relaxed fit, go up!). Designed in LA, made in USA 64% Cotton 20% Rayon 16% Polyester / Lining 100% Polyester Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Eva Franco Go Bold or Go Home
description: Another striped dress? Nonsense. This is a bold graphic take on the striped dress. Side panels along the bodice is streamline and gives an extreme slimming effect (great for this with bigger chests). Pinched waist accentuates curves (great for boyish figures). Thick stripes on a full pleated skirt gives a famine flounce. There's something for everyone. Fit: The fabric on this is quite substantial. It's a nice thick jersey feel for smooth lines (bye-bye bra back fat!). Runs sliiiiightly generously, but that may also be because this sumptuous fabric has a good amount of stretch. You don't want this baggy anywhere, so if you're between sizes, size down. Size 2 fits up to a 34 inch bust, up to a 26.5 inch waist. Size 4 fits up to a 35 inch bust, up to a 27.5 inch waist. A size 6 fits up to a 36 inch bust, up to a 28.5 inch waist...etc... Chuck wears a size 2. Designed in LA, made in USA 64% Rayon 27% Nylon 4% Spandex / Lining 92% Polyester 8% Spandex Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Allison Parris Viva la Purple dress
description: The party season is upon us. So let. us. party. And let's start with this classic sweetheart strapless A-line dress in a fabulously exotic marigold color or royally rich purple. Boning in the bodice lend support for the girls so you can dance the night away worry free. And we guarantee volume of the crinoline skirt will last longer than your hairdo. Measures 19 inches from waist to hem. Fit: True to size but on the roomy side in the cups. Smaller gals will want to wear a padded strapless bra or have other assistance in that area. This dress has boning at the bust and ample cup room for comfort and support where you need it. And with a strapless dress, you usually need it. If you're between sizes or extra gifted up top, size up and get the waist taken in. A size 2 fits up to a 34 inch bust and up to 26 inch waist. A size 4 fits a 35 inch bust and up to 27.5 inch waist. name: Darling Sakura
description: Never had a chance to see the Cherry Blossoms in person? Meh, us neither. Until then slap on this botanical baby and you're as good as there. Lilac pops out from a muted gray background. A flattery flare silhouette and matching vintage inspired belt make this a go-to when the sun is out. Go find yourself a garden party to attend. Fit: X-Small fits a size 0 to 2 (up to 33.5 inch bust, up to 26 inch waist). Small fits a size 4 (up to 34.5 inch bust, up to 27 inch waist). Medium fits a size 6 (up to a 35.5 inch bust, up to 28 inch waist)...etc...If you find yourself between sizes or you just aren't quite sure which size would fit best, we recommend sizing up since you don't want this style skin tight and the elastic belt will cinch in the waist regardless for a nice fit. If you still aren't sure, email us! Chuck wears a Small. Designed in London, made in China 100% Polyester / Lining 100% Polyester / Mesh 100% Nylon Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Allson Parris Morning Glory dress
description: Wakey wakey sleepy head. Not a morning person? We feel you. Nothing will put that bush in your tail and that bright in your eye like this fun flirty dress. Kelly green vine print on this cotton lovely is perfect for outdoor events. Adore the sweetheart neckline with the tiny V cutout. And the POOF of the skirt is unparalleled. Shamelessly girly. Measures 18.5 inches from waist to hem. Fit: True to size but on the roomy side in the cups. Smaller gals will want to wear a padded strapless bra or have other assistance in that area. This dress has boning at the bust and ample cup room for comfort and support where you need it. And with a strapless dress, you usually need it. If you're between sizes or extra gifted up top, size up and get the waist taken in. A size 2 fits up to a 34 inch bust and up to 26 inch waist. A size 4 fits a 35 inch bust and up to 27.5 inch waist. A size 6 fits a 36 inch bust and up to 28.5 inch waist. Chuck wears a size 4. Designed and made in USA. 100% Cotton Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Eva Franco Charlotte dress
description: Black dresses are like jeans. Can you really have too many of them? We think not. Especially when they look like this! Lace, tulle, sheer...it's beautiful, it's sophisticated, it's just plain 'ol fun. You have the option of going Carrie Bradshaw brave and skip the slip like the model in the photo, or of course go with the slinky slip that is included. Double tier tulle longer length skirt is a little ballerina girly, but not cupcakey at all. Measures 20 inches from waist to hem. Fit: Slightly generous since the fabric has give, but you definitely don't want this too tight. Size 2 fits up to a 34 inch bust, a 26 inch waist. Size 4 fits up to a 35 inch bust, a 27 inch waist. Size 6 fits up to a 36 inch bust, a 28 inch waist, etc. Chuck wears a size 2. Designed and made in USA Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: S.Nine Hydrangea
description: Oh. Niiice. S. Nine really knows how to get our attention with all this draping. Built in bustier is lightly boned. Keeps the girls in place but doesn't feel like a straitjacket. Fitted through the tummy, hips and butt but not without a little help. Crossover pleating creates a fancy distraction. Our favorite part is the slightly fluttery silk chiffon around the upper arms...hey not all of us love our upper arms. Pretty little flower detail at the shoulders just for fun. Fit: Running about a size small. Size 2 fits like a size 0, size 4 fits like a size 2, size 6 fits like a size 4, etc. Chuck can fit into a size 4, but prefers a size 6 with the waist taken in a little. Measures about 19.5 inches from waist to hem. Designed and made in Hong Kong. 100% Silk ; lining 100% polyester Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Eva Franco Caught in Your Web dress
description: Dramatic, romantic, sexy. Black embroidered lace in an unconventional pattern brings a much darker edge to this season's trend. A saffron slip pop from underneath, giving an almost haunting glow. Who knows what...or who you'll catch in this sassy web (dress). Fit: The embroidered lace has a little stretch to it, making the fit easy and comfy. Runs pretty true to size thanks to the stretch and the belt. Size 2 fits up to a 34 inch bust, and up to a 26 inch waist. Size 4 fits up to a 35 inch bust, and up to a 27 inch waist. Size 6 fits up to a 36 inch bust, and up to a 28 inch waist. Chuck wears a size 4 for the extra room in the bust and upper arms. If you're busty, size up because you can always tighten the waist with the belt. Measures 24 inches from waist to hem of the saffron slip, 27 inches from waist to the hem of the black lace. Designed in New York and made in the USA. 100% Nylon / 100% Viscose lining Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Lucullen Jewel Dress
description: No not the singer. As much as we love(d) her, she doesn’t have what it takes for this dress. Not even during her bad girl stage. But throw in a little Madonna circa Vogue days and we might consider it. This dress is hhh-amazing. The beautiful heavy woven fabric from Japan is perfect for a voluminous skirt. Looks harmless enough from the front, right? Wrong. Turn around! Didn’t we say this was hhh-amazing? Fit: True to size and perfect and wonderful. Chuck is simply smitten with the 2. Still not sure about sizing? 100% Polyester and Designed in Toronto Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Kirribilla Tie it in a Bow
description: Do you ears hang low? Can you tie it in a bow? No bother, Kirribilla has got you covered. Not just one bow, but two. Yes, two. A big flirty one at the back, and a big one over the right shoulder. Perfect for a fancy date, even better for a black-tie affair. The beautiful silk wool blend has a slight sheen to it, adding to a it's wow factor. A sophisticated fit and...Pockets! Fit: Runs slightly generously, but better that than too tight in this dress. Size 2 fits a bust up to 34 inches, a waist up to 27 inches, and hips up to 37 inches. A size 4 fits a bust up to 35 inches, a waist up to 28 inches, and hips up to 38 inches. A size 6 fits a bust up to 36 inches, a waist up to 29 inches and hips up to 39 inches. Chuck wears a size 4 with the waist taken in a bit. Measures 20.5 inches from waist to hem. Designed and made in the USA 90% Silk 10% Wool , 100% Polyester lining Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Heidi Merrick Westerly dress
description: Silly Rabbit, denim is for jeans. Not anymore, kids. Denim now shines as a classy wear-it-everywhere wrap dress. Heavy weight dark rinse denim is luxurious. Dress it up, dress it down, Westerly's ready for any accessory you throw at it. The button up is slightly off kilter, adding a touch of playfulness. Super wide self-tie belt to cinch in the waist. Pockets! Fit: Easy fit, running perhaps a little generous because the style is meant to be worn a little haphazardly, bunched here and there. Size 2 fits a 2 to smaller 4 (up to 34.5 inches in the bust, up to 27 inches around the waist). Size 4 fits a size 4 to 6 (up to 35.5 inches in the bust, up to 28 inches around the waist. Chuck wears a size 2. Measures 23 inches from the waist to hem. Designed and made in LA. 100% Linen Denim Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Dawn Sharp Wednesday dress
description: We all admired Wednesday for her heavy eyeliner, killer deadpan and fantastic sense of style. Oh, youth. This dress will be anything you want it to be with a change of shoes and accessories. We threw on a bright red belt for a pop of color (belt not included). Keep it simple or dress it up. You'll need to bring your own killer deadpan. Fit: This woven linen fabric is luxuriously thick with a bit of stretch. A size Small fits a bust up to 34 inches and waist up to 28 inches. A Medium fits a bust up to 36 inches and waist up to 30 inches. Chuck wears a Small. Measures 23.5 inches from waist to hem. Designed in Portland made in USA Perforated Cotton Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Nuj Novakhett Breakfast at Tiffany's dress
description: Chase away those mean reds with this drop dead classy number by Nuj Novakhett. Beautiful pearls decorate each shoulder and a step hem keeps things interesting. Classy and sassy. Now you can have Breakfast at Tiffany's anywhere. Fit: The blousy style makes this dress an easy fit. Fits true to size. A size 2 fits a bust up to 33 inches, waist up to 26 inches, hips up to 36 inches. A size 4 fits a bust up to 34 inches, waist up to 27 inches, hips up to 37 inches. A size 6 fits a bust up to 35 inches, waist up to 28 inches, hips up to 38 inches. Chuck wears a size 4. Measures 20 inches from waist to hem. Designed and made in Thailand. Chuck Designed and made in Thailand Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Eve Gravel Rhythm Nation dress
description: Military inspired but still feminine and not over the top. The simple wool blend navy plaid is casual and cozy, but dressed up (and spiced up) with solid black paneling at the waist to visually enhance an hour glass figure. Fringe shoulders lend a little movement and that "sump'in-sump'in" that we are always looking for in a dress. So go on, bust out those Janet moves that you practiced for hours in your bedroom back when MTV actually played music videos. Fit: Runs pretty true to the average S,M,L range. A Small fits a larger size 2 to size 4 (bust up to 34 inches, waist up to 27, hips up to 36.5 inches. A Medium fits a larger size 4 to size 6 (bust up to 35.5 inches, waist up to 28.5 inches, hips up to 38 inches), etc. . Chuck wears a Small. Measures 22 inches from waist to hem. Designed and made in Montreal, Quebec, Canada 70% Wool 30% Polyester Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Gar-de Heads or Tails Jacket
description: “Business in the front, party in the back” usually conjures images of A.C. Slater and Bud Bundy. But this jacket from Gar-de just might change all that. This jacket appears pretty straight forward from the front. Black and white tweedy wool, a structured blazer-like fit, hip grazing length and extra large prominent pockets (love). But look! Tuxedo tails! With a zipper! We die. Do you see this? Love it. Perfectly cute with a dress, totally cool with skinny jeans. We always said it would take a lot for a non-dress to make it into Sunday Brunch. Well. Here you have it. It’s a lot of awesome. The first jacket to come to the store. We couldn't help it. Fit: Running a little big. A size Small fits a larger 2 to 4 (bust up to 35 inches). A Medium fits a 4 to 6 (bust up to 36.5 inches). Chuck wears a Small. Designed in New York and made in China 53% Wool 34% Polyester 7% Acrylic 6% Other + 100% leather ; 100% Cotton lining Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Lucullen Origami Dress
description: Oooooooh. Ahhhhhh. We can’t keep our mits off this dress by Lucullen. This is a supremely heavenly (and heavy!) silky stretch satin. Oooooh. We already said that. But really. What you see is what you get. The designer behind Lucullen (besides being a genius and the sweetest little thing ever) is a master of fabrics. Each season she imports them from all over the world. The strong shoulders featured on this dress are all over the runways this season and captured beautifully in this piece. Asymmetric pleating gives dimension and draws the eye. The exposed zipper in the back under a plunging back line is killer. The fabric is from France. Fit: The tighter the better. Sizes running true to size but please email with any questions if you have doubts (there’s stretch to this material). Chuck is killin’ it in the 2. Still not sure about sizing? 64% Acetate 32% Polyamide 4% Elastic and Designed in Toronto Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Yoana Baraschi Natasha Fatale trench
description: This wool blend trench is so spy chic we couldn't help but name her after one of our favorite ladies of espionage, Natasha Fatale. Come all you Bullwinkle fans. Sure, Natasha co-conspirator, Boris were always up to no good in the name of Fearless Leader. But one can't say that girl's hairdo and purple bodycon dress weren't trendsetting. The color combo of gunmetal grey and camel makes it perfect for Fall as the temp starts to drop. The over-sized collar is faux fur lined, but not the kind of faux fur that feels like rug. It's the kind that you want to pet...and pet. A slightly longer length in the back adds a touch of drama, which you'll need on your Mission: Fabulous. Pockets! Fit: True to size. This is a Fall weight trench (but warm enough for west coast "winters"), but if you want to layer and wear in colder weather we suggest sizing up. Hidden snap buttons and self belt (extra long so you can tie it like a proper trench should be) ensures a fitted look. Measures 16 inches from shoulder to shoulder, 15 inches from waist to front hem, 18 inches from waist to back hem. Chuck wears a size 4. Designed and made in New York City 45% Acrylic 30% Polyester 20% Wool 5% Other / 55% Polyester 45% Viscose Lining Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Eve Gravel Montreal jacket
description: Oui, this relaxed woven stripe jacket is going to go with, literally, everything winter, spring or fall. It's somewhat cropped, but not too short as to give the line-backer look, and not too long to help show off your outfit and your legs. It's somewhat fitted but in a boyfriend-blazer relaxed androgynous kind of way that is so French we can't stand it. It's a little of everything you've ever wanted, really. Loving the texture of the fabric that is a little updated Chanel, without the price tag. Fit: You want this to look relaxed. If you think you're between sizes (have wide shoulder, bigger bust, etc), size up. But don't worry. This runs pretty true to size for usual S, M, L size runs. Small measures 16 inches from shoulder to shoulder, and 19.5 inches from shoulder tip to hem. Chuck wears a size small perfectly! Actually, Chuck has already selfishly kept one for herself and been wearing it about town. It hits right at the top of her hip bone. Perfection. Designed and made in Montreal, Quebec, Canada 71% Cotton 22% Acrylic 2% Viscose 5% Other Fiber Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Heidi Merrick Walking on Sunshine dress
description: Stick a fork in us, we're done for this dress. Impossibly light, in an impossibly cheery yet sophisticated color. The barely there sleeves are just magnificent against the skin. This is sheer done to perfection. And have we mentioned how hard it is to find a yellow dress? This is it. End of discussion. Perfect as a summer dress (you'll need a slip! or a really fun bandeau bra), fancy schmancy beach cover up, or for lounging on the yacht. Sleeves can be worn down, or gathered up and tied at the back (leather tie included) like a racerback. Fit: Easy fit thanks to the elastic gathered waist. Fits a range of size, but if you're busty, size up. This gorgeous babe is definitely see through so you'll need to get creative with a slip or colorful layering for street wear. Chuck wears a size 4. Measures 24 inches from waist (sits between natural waist and empire waist) to hem. Designed and made in USA 100% Silk Chiffon Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Kirribilla Main Street, USA dress
description: Remember your first time at Disneyland? Walking down Main Street with its quaint corners and dandy men on bicycles. This dress with its stripes and bow really take us back to what's sweet and good in life. The over-sized bow at the back is lined in a bright yellow that pops when it peeks out. A sweetheart neckline is universally flattery. To. Die. For. Fit: Pretty true to size. Boning at the bust lends support. A size 2 fits a bust up to 33.5 inches and a 26 inch waist. A size 4 fits a bust up to 34.5 inches and a 27 inch waist. A size 6 fits a bust up to 35.5 inches and a 28 inch waist. Etc. Chuck wears a size 4. Measures 18.5 inches from waist to hem. Designed and made in USA. 100% Cotton. Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Alexandra Grecco UP dress
description: This dress looks absolutely stunning, yes, but just wait until we tell you that each darling air balloon on each darling dress was HAND PAINTED by the designer and her artist friend. Yes, feel free to make all sorts of squealing noises in disbelief now. But believe it. Loving the balloons, loving the colors, loving this sooooo vintage Grace Kelly collar and Marilyn skirt. Loving this, period. Fit: Runs generously. A size 2 fits a larger size 2 to 4 (waist up to 27.5 inches, bust up to 35.5 inches). A size 4 fits a larger size 4 to 6 (waist up to 28.5 inches, bust up to 37.5 inches), etc. Chuck wears a size 2. Measures 20 inches from waist to hem. Designed and made in New York. 100% Silk Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Heidi Merrick Desert Island tunic
description: A sheer delight, from our love, Heidi Merrick. When asked that damned question of what you'd bring should you be stranded on a desert island, you'll never hesitate to answer again. You will forsake those matches for this airy, embroidered beauty. Fresh water be damned, at least you'll look fantastic when you run into Sawyer on the beach. Black smoke monster not included. Fit: Easy, just look! Baby's see through, so get creative. Chuck wears a size 2. And she's never going to take it off. Ever. Measure 23 inches from the bottom of the scoop neck to the hem. Designed and made in USA 100% untreated Cotton Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Eskell Coup d'etat
description: We all have that dress we wear to death because it's easy. But mostly because it's cool and makes us look better than we sometimes feel. This guy is shaped to flatter almost every figure. Helps that it's meant to be worn loosey goosey, like you just rolled out of bed looking this good. The geometric print is like something you'd find at the Whitney. Shoulder slits show off some skin and turn up the heat. Long key hole back. We picture this at brunch or a rockin' concert. Pair with your baddest combat boots. Fit: Easy. An X-Small fits a 0-2 (up to 33 inch bust, up to 27 inch waist), maybe a small 4. description:

S/M fits a size 2 to small 4 (bust up to 34.5 inches). M/L fits a size 4 to small 6 (bust up to 35.5 inches). Chuck can wear a S/M as well as a M/L but prefers the M/L. If you are curvier up top, or perhaps in between sizes, size up. Waist line is somewhere between an empire and a regular waist. Measures 23 inches from waist to hem. *Model photo is demonstrating twirl potential in another pattern, not available. Designed and made in NYC 100% Silk Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: T. Tandon Penny Lane Dress
description: 70% off, Originally $280 Oh Penny. You look simple enough from the front, but you’re all party in the back. Leave your capes at home (that’s right, your cape) because this dress has one built in. Flashes of skin here and there, but you’re technically covered up. T.Tandon is throwing us for a loop. Like the Historian there is something period like with this dress but we can’t quite figure it out. But either way we always like a dress with a little kick to it. This one has a kick and a cape. Pockets! Fit: Super easy, super breezy. Literally. Chuck wears the XS. Small would be good for a size 4. Medium would be good for a size 6. Still not sure about sizing? 100% Cotton and Designed in NY Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: IVANAHelsinki Copperhead dress
description: 70% off, originally $305 Check it. Copper Houndstooth print, uber textured and woven with tinsel-like threads. The look and feel of a sweetheart strapless dress without actually having to suffer through the discomfort of a strapless dress. Feeling festive? We are. Get your groove on. Fit: Running generously, particularly around the waist. A 34 fits like a larger size 4 (bust up to 35 inches, waist up to 28 inches), a size 36 fits like a larger size 6 (bust up to 36 inches, waist up to 29 inches), a 38 fits like a larger size 8, etc. Chuck wears a size 34 but needs to take it in a little around the waist. Designed and made in Finland 77% Cotton 12% Polyester 11% Polyamide Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Kloset Guinevere Dress
description: 70% off, Originally $340 A modern day Guinevere. The sleeves are sheer, the skirt is shortened, but the faux dirndl square neckline is an homage to the beauty of the female décolletage. Watch out boys. This isn’t the kind of princess that needs saving. The dress is empire waist but tent dress it is not. The natural waist is still tapered and accentuated. We just love a good long sleeve dress we can wear anywhere. The model is wearing the blue version. We like how she paired the dress with a bib necklace (Judy snipped off her buttons already). Fit: True to size. Chuck wears the 38. The 36 will fit a size 2 up to a bra size 32C or 34B. A size 38 fits up to a small 6, bra size up to 34C, 36B. There are little bra strap fasteners at the shoulders to prevent slipping, but we suggest wearing a bra with thin straps or red straps to camouflage. Still not sure about sizing? 100% Polyester and Made in Thailand Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Yoana Baraschi Dirty Martini
description: 70% off, originally $350 When do you ever see a copper silk dress never mind one this rockin’!? This is the perfect work to cocktail dress in our opinion. Professional and sleek for those power meetings…slick and sultry for that blind date. You’ve got to show that date who’s boss and you’ve got to do it in this dress. The shoulders are strong and make a statement with the squared pleating and overlay sleeves. The bodice seams and darting come together at one point at the waist and emphasize an hourglass figure. Make Joan Holloway proud. Fit: True to size. This style is snug at the waist and around the ribcage but loose at the shoulders, straight at the hips. Chuck wears a 2 at the moment, but probably a 4 around the holidays. Still not sure about sizing? 54% Rayon 46% Acetate and Designed in NY Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Kloset Around the World Dress
description: 70% off, Originally $391 Sometimes a girl just needs to get away from it all. This dress is all about fun. Elastic waist means you just pull it on and go, no zipper or button in sight. The sheer bib and flutter sleeves are a little cheeky while the construction of the skirt in the back is not to be trifled with. It’s hard to tell (for good reason!) until you get up close and personal. You’ll find the petal lay-over style of this slight tulip design a bit “peeky” so be sure to wear cute undies just in case. We’re no work and all play in this one. Kloset loves to incorporate themes of imagination…this print looks like a playground! Fit: Runs small. A size 36 would be good for a 0 or smaller 2. A 38 would be good for a 2 or smaller 4. Chuck wears a 38. Still not sure about sizing? 100% Silk and Made in Thailand Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Kloset Lower East Side Dress
description: 70% off, originally $386 Here’s a Rock ‘n Roll dress if we’ve ever seen one. Who else but a bad ass or a 2nd grader could pair cherry red with purple? The choker around the neck is really what makes this dress for us. A final touch that says : “don’t mess.” Tiny red beads are hand-stitched to the trims on the ruffles. Fit: On the small side. A 36 is a Small and fits a US size 2 and 4, but a smaller 4. A 38 is a Medium and fits a US size 4 and 6, but a smaller 6. This dress is a loose shifty fit, similar to Mimi Turner’s Terra Cotta dress. It’s all about the legs. Chuck wears a 36. Still not sure about sizing? 80% Cotton 20% Polyester and Designed in Thailand. Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Kloset Shadow Dress
description: 70% off, originally $377 Who’s there? Oh, just my shadow. But my! My shadow looks good in that dress! Sheer silk and cotton with buttons and bows in a delightful grey; the dress comes with a matching slip. Fit: On the small side. A 36 is a Small and fits a US size 2 and 4, but a smaller 4. A 38 is a Medium and fits a US size 4 and 6, but a smaller 6. This dress is an easy tunic like fit. Chuck wears a 36 with a funky pair of ankle booties. Still not sure about sizing? 100% Silk and Designed in Thailand. Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: FIN Organic Bamboo Ruffled Zipper Dress
description: 70% off, Originally $517 Dear Santa. What do I get the hard core tree hugging party hopping dress loving dreams about riding on the back of a motorcycle with a hottie kind of gal in my life? Yours truly, Utterly Confused. Dear Utterly Confused. No need to be confused. FIN’s Eco friendly Ruffled Zipper dress is the dress for that good little girl in your life. Thinly stacked ruffles made of organic bamboo contrasted with zipper hardware. Your girl is complicated but this choice doesn’t need to be. Now, don’t forget that I like 1% milk with my cookies. SC. Fit: Fit is easy and loose, but these guys are running a little on the larger side. Slightly off the shoulder bateau neckline and straight down to above the knees. Size 36 fits a size larger 2-4, size 38 fits a size 6. Chuck wears a 36. Still not sure about sizing? 100% Organic Bamboo and designed in Oslo Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Nomia Cold Shoulder Dress
description: 60% off, originally $369 Give ‘em the cold shoulder in this super sexy somehow understated but totally amped up dress by Nomia. We’ll assume you won’t need further explanation. Net covered shirt collar and pockets add the finishing touch. Sheer awesomeness. This is perhaps the softest silk we've ever felt. Fit: Runs a bit small in the skirt. Size 4 fits like a 2 (up to 35 inch hip), size 6 fits like a 4 (up to 36 inch hip) , etc...Chuck is between a size 6 and 8 as she's got some junk in the trunk and the 6 is sliiiiightly snug around the caboose. You want to make sure it's not tight around that area or else you bet that pulled silk look and no one likes that. Still not sure about sizing? Made in New York 100% Sandwashed silk / 98% Nylon 2% Spandex combo (Net) Don't see your size?

name: Yoana Baraschi Bond, James Bond Dress
description: 70% off, originally $345 Admit it. You've always wanted to use that line. This dress by Yoana Baraschi is sleek, sexy and simply put, Bad.Ass. The corseted style and snug fit make a bra unnecessary. Shiny gold grommets contrast starkly and bring the eyes where they ought to be. True Bond style. Fit: Running a little generously particularly around the hips. Chuck fits great in the size 2 in the skirt and waist, but the top is squishing a bit too much. So technically in between sizes, but wears the 4 just as well and may take it in slightly to get a more tapered look around the toosh. There's not a ton of room in the cups, so best for B cups and smaller. Still not sure about sizing? Made in New York Don't see your size?

name: Toni Francesco Sgt. Pepper
description: 70% off, originally $305 Our guess is you won't be feeling too lonely hearts with this dress on. Quite the opposite. Military structure without the stiffness. Strong shoulders are balanced with an ultra slim body fit. Mini peplum-like accents highlight the waist and frankly just look cool. The navy sheen really pops from the dark matte. This is definitely more a Serena dress than a Blair dress. We suggest wearing opaque tights with this one as the skirt length is pretty short. OR. Those over the knee boots would be pretty freakin' hot. Fit: Pretty true to size. A size 36 fits like a size 2 (bust up to 33.5 inches, waist up to 26 inches, hips up to 36 inches). A size 38 fits like a size 4 (bust up to 34.5 inches, waist up to 27 inches, hips up to 37.5 inches). Chuck wears a size 38. Measures 15 inches from waist to hem. Designed and made in Spain 60% Polyester 28% Viscose 9% Cotton 3% Elastane Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Lorick Late Siki Jacket Dress
description: 70% off, originally $368 Suh-weet. Sure, we’re obvious suckers for anything black and sheer. But just LOOK at this dress! Jacket? Best thing ever?? This will take a little more creative thinking on your part, but once you get started, the outfits will be endless. Sheer black silk constructed into a button up dress/jacket with sublet (but essential) blue printed piping. Nice touch, very nice touch. Piping is somewhat shape-able so be sure to shape up. Oh we’ve got plans for you, Siki. Tulle petti coat, that sexy slip we have no idea what to do with, over a long gown, tease in the boudoir…oh yeah, we got plans. The first is going to be a pair of high waisted Daisy Dukes! * Here Siki is shown with a simple black slip underneath and a skinny belt (the one from Lorick's New Villager dress). Neither slip nor belt are included with purchase. You'll have to dig through your own closet! Fit: True to size, though slightly generous like a dress jacket ought to be. Chuck wears a size 2. Still not sure about sizing? Made in India 100% silk Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Yoana Baraschi All Night Long Dress
description: 70% off, Originally $386 These flashy sequins are begging to party all night long. We’re thinking early cocktails, classy sit down dinner, and then a night out with the girls at that place you swore you’d never be caught dead at. Now pull your eyes away from the pretty shiny things (we know it’s hard) to the shoulders. We love the slices of silk “sleeves.” An adaptation of the cutout trend without feeling like your little sister just took scissors to your favorite dress. Fit: Easy. This style is not meant to be tight! We suggest buying your normal dress size in this one. Chuck wears a 2….and she’s partying “aaaall niiiiight looooong…” sorry, we had to. Still not sure about sizing? Shell 100% Polyester / Lining 100% Silk and Designed in NY Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Keemia Leslie Dress
description: 70% off, Originally $357 Crazy. Sexy. Cool. This one from Keemia is laid back and easy to sport. It’s a double layered stretch silk chiffon racer back with well placed cutouts. Why well placed? Because it makes your waist look tiny! We immediately pictured this dress with a belt looped through the back under the black layer. Chilly? Throw on a nip tucked blazer. Fit: Runs pretty true to size. The chiffon is stretch so it’s meant to be pretty snug on the body. An X-Small fits a 2 or small 4. The Small fits a 4 small 6. A Medium fits up to a larger 6. Chuck likes the feel of the X-small. Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!

name: Tony Cohen Poe dress
description: 60% off, originally $199 Brooding much? No? Want to look like you're brooding much? Yes? Well this is your ticket. Stretch dark denim body with black silky pleated uber dolman sleeves (by uber we mean that the sleeves connect all the way down to the hips). A successful brooder must look dark and mysterious, tough but vulnerable for the right someone. Most importantly a brooder must look fab without looking like she spent any time doing it. Good thing this dress just goes over the head, not even a zipper to bother with. You have enough things to think about after all. Super east, super slimming. Now you just need to accessorize with an old copy of The Raven and a coffee, black of course. Fit: True to size. The denim is super stretchy, but meant to fit pretty snug. A size 2 fits up to 33 inches around the bust, up to 35 inches around the hips. The waist is open thanks to the dolman sleeves. A size 4 fits up to 34 inches around the bust, up to 36 inches around the hips. Chuck wears a size 4. Designed in Amsterdam and made in China 84% Polyester 24% Rayon 4% Spandex ; 100% Viscose Still not sure about sizing? Don't see your size? Get free shipping and give aways here!
